attributes.action: Step in and take action to halt the extradition of Gary McKinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gary McKinnon is a misguided and ill person. The US legal system will doubtlessly throw the book at this man whom was, foolishly perhaps, simply looking for UFO information, nothing more, nothing less. Gordon Brown - for once in your life make a man of yourself, get some credit from the public and STOP this extradition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
